thread.title: john holzer
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by john holzer

author: john holzer
title: john holzer
text: i had pleasure of working with malcolm making arrangements for a trip to australia this year. thanks to him we had a great experience using korean airlines, prestige class while traveling. should have probably used alpha flight guru in the past to save $$$$; thanks again, malcolm for your followup and help arranging this trip for us. john
